message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500.  I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's meet in the middle!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,800 for the product. That's as high as I can go.
